title: Bloodbath.PS3-DUPLEX
description:
- D U P L E X -

P R O U D L Y   P R E S E N T S

Bloodbath

Date      : 07/2014                    Languages: English
Platform  : PS3                        Genre    : Action

Release Info:

Blood Bath is a class-based 3rd person hack 'n' slash in which the player
assumes the role of a fighter who competes in a violent
post-apocalyptic bloodsport, fighting in combats all around the world.
It mixes intense combat and finishing moves to create a single and
multiplayer bloody action experience like no other.
Features:
- More than 12 fighters with specific abilities, weapons and skills.
- Six different arenas each with their own traps, strategy and tactics.
- Strong Multiplayer focus: 4 vs 4 co-op, teams and versus.
- Upgrade your fighter's skills, change his weapons and experience how different a fight can be.
- Awesome visuals and animations, spectacular finishing moves and frenzied action situations like no other.
- Post-apocalyptic gladiatorial games.
- Fast and bloody multiplayer hack 'n' slash combat.
- In game upgradeable combat skills (skill and tactics).
- Adapt classic FPS game modes to hack 'n' slash mechanics and propose new ones.
- Twisted Bloodsports TV show elements: Frenzy crowd, commentators, MVP.
Notes:

Enjoy This Fine DUPLEX Release
